nodes.message: TODO: use the GotGift tag instead of checking twice.

nodes.text: Would you like an apple?
Bards should never turn down a chance for free food. You never know when you will next eat! Thanks, Shawn.
Would you like an Apple Tart?
Would I ever! There's always room for dessert.
Would you like this book on picking locks? Never know when you might need it to get out of trouble.
I never really thought about it before, but I guess Bards do get into their share of tricky situations. Picking locks might be a useful thing to know. Thanks.
I found this weird book the other day - would you like to have it?
Let me take a look at it...
There's something really strange and unpleasant about the feel of this book...
I can't read the writing, but whatever it says, I don't want to know. It's bad... really bad.
I don't want anything to do with that book, whatever it is. I don't think you should keep it, either. Maybe you could drop it into a volcano or something. Just get rid of it.
I found a bottle of the best wine this castle ever had to offer - the Dryad's Kiss! Would you like to have it?
Would I ever! Pass the bottle, Shawn - we'll drink it together.

Bottle of Wine, 
Makes me feel fine,
But Dryad's Kissh,
Makes me feel Blissh!
<sigh> That was great shhhtuff. You are the besht friend anyone could ever have Shawn! I love you, man.
Would you like some wine? I found it down in the cellar.
Sure, I never pass up an offer for free drinks. I'd be kicked out of Bard's School if I did.
Would you like some Golden Wine?
Sure, it sounds tasty. Hope it's as good as it looks. Pass the bottle, Shawn, and we'll toast each other until it's gone.
To the best roommate I've ever had!
And to one of the best wines I've ever tasted...
(sigh) It's empty. The gold is gone, all we have left is the bottle to remind us of its glory.
I came across this old love ballad book and I thought you might like it.
Oh my gosh - is that a genuine copy of the Wilde's Ballads, a collection of the greatest ballads every written?
Thank you! With this book, I should be able to sing the finest songs ever sung by mortal man!
I'd like you to have this ring.

You know what that is, right? It's a promise ring. You are supposed to give it to someone you love, if they love you back. Thanks for the offer, but I'll get my own "One and Only" Ring to give to someone.
Thanks, Shawn, it's nice of you to offer it to me, but I'm sure I'll find my own ring to give to that special someone in my life.
Wow, you must really love me to give me that ring. I never realized that you were such a romantic person, Shawn.
This is so unexpected... I don't even have a song to sing about how happy I am. Thank you... thank you so much!
What's that? A "One and Only" Ring?
You're supposed to give that to someone you love.
Aeolus - I love you. I want you to have this ring as a token of my feelings for you.
What? You love me? I never dreamed.. I mean, wow. Just wow.
Do you know how happy I am right now? I'm speechless. Just speechless! <hug>
Oh, I guess I didn't realize what the ring was for...
Don't worry, Shawn, I bet you'll find your one and only someday.
I brought you a rose.
Thanks, Shawn, that's nice of you. I like the scent of roses. I'll press it in my music book.
I came across this bead necklace and I thought that you might like to have it.
Whoa... that's nice. I've never had anyone give me beads before. Thanks, Shawn. It's nice of you to give me a gift like this. Not sure what I'll do with it, but it is the thought that counts!
I'll just sit on that gift idea for now.
Hrm... I don't think I have a good gift with me right now.
